text: Kusinara or Kushinagara is a town in Uttar Pradesh, India with a population of 22,214.http://www.censusindia.gov.in/pca/SearchDetails.aspx?Id=216153 The town got its name because of the amount of kusha grass in the area.https://archive.org/details/in.ernet.dli.2015.94077/page/n187/mode/2up == References == Category:Towns in India
title: Kusinara
